info.description: If you're looking for a stable distro with some reasonable customization options which is also the world's most popular distribution, look no further than Ubuntu.

info.description: Manjaro is a distribution based on Arch Linux but has a separate official repository that contains more stable packages than Arch Linux's. You can't go wrong with Pacman and Manjaro.
